title: Krome Studio Plus v1.0.0 APK (Android)
description:
Welcome to Krome, your personal photo DESIGNER. The $0.99 cost of this App includes your FIRST Photo Design project, it is a SAVINGS of $5.00 or more. Our professional designers transform your photos into works of art. Work directly with a specialist to request custom photo edits through your mobile device or desktop at the best possible price. 

Features:
Your personal photo designer
â€¢ From helping you look your best to telling your photo story, no job is too big our small for our team of photo experts
Prompt & convenient service
â€¢ Submit your photo requests directly from your phone, tablet or desktop. 
â€¢ Most photo projects take less than 24 hours to complete.
Advanced photo edits for less
A professional graphic designer can cost up to $350 an hour! Krome offers personalized photo transformation for a flat fee. Get your first photo for $.99 and pay for what you request on subsequent orders:
â€¢ Photo correction, restoration or repair
â€¢ Change a background
â€¢ Add objects/people to a photo
â€¢ Look your best: remove imperfections and glare, smooth and/or brighten skin and eyes
â€¢ Create works of art and much more
Satisfaction guaranteed
â€¢ Your 100% satisfaction is our #1 priority. 
â€¢ Enjoy 1 complimentary re-edit. Additional re-edits available for $1.99.
â€¢ Join over 100K satisfied customers whoâ€™ve given our photo editing services an average rating of 4.5 stars!

Instruction Guide:
1. Download our app
2. Select a photo to edit from your phone photo gallery
3. Share your vision & tell us how we can create the perfect photo
4. Create an account. A photo specialist will contact you once your photo project is ready to view
5. Receive your completed photo project in approximately 24 hours
6. Enjoy and share your photos with loved ones!

Why we made this app:
Photos are important to us. They are visual reminders of our lives. They are part of our online identity. We use them to get jobs, find dates, make friends, and to remember events, people, and places we've been. But maybe they didnâ€™t turn out exactly the way we intended â€“ a little too dark, or with distractions in the background. Maybe the whole family finally looks good and the background doesn't. Krome gives you control to enhance, preserve and create the perfect photo. Simply share your vision, and weâ€™ll take care of the rest!

Required Android O/S : 4.0.3 and up
